ddl_create: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS oasisreport (xmlns TEXT, PRIMARY KEY (xmlns));

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS messageheader (version TEXT, timedate TEXT, source TEXT, oasisreport_xmlns TEXT, FOREIGN KEY (oasisreport_xmlns) REFERENCES oasisreport(xmlns), PRIMARY KEY (version, timedate, source));
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS messagepayload (id TEXT, oasisreport_xmlns TEXT, FOREIGN KEY (oasisreport_xmlns) REFERENCES oasisreport(xmlns), PRIMARY KEY (id));
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS rto (name TEXT, messagepayload_id TEXT, FOREIGN KEY (messagepayload_id) REFERENCES messagepayload(id), PRIMARY KEY (name));
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS report_item (id TEXT, rto_name TEXT, FOREIGN KEY (rto_name) REFERENCES rto(name), PRIMARY KEY (id));

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS report_header (uom TEXT, sec_per_interval INTEGER, interval TEXT, system TEXT, tz TEXT, mkt_type TEXT, report TEXT, report_item_id TEXT, FOREIGN KEY (report_item_id) REFERENCES report_item(id), PRIMARY KEY (uom, sec_per_interval, interval, system, tz, mkt_type, report));

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS report_data (interval_num INTEGER, interval_start_gmt TEXT, data_item TEXT, opr_date TEXT, reason TEXT, value REAL, interval_end_gmt TEXT, resource_name TEXT, id TEXT, report_item_id TEXT, FOREIGN KEY (report_item_id) REFERENCES report_item(id), PRIMARY KEY (interval_num, interval_start_gmt, data_item, opr_date, reason, value, interval_end_gmt, resource_name, id));
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS disclaimer_item (disclaimer TEXT, rto_name TEXT, FOREIGN KEY (rto_name) REFERENCES rto(name), PRIMARY KEY (disclaimer));
